Package com.example.federico.wearableui.services.connection.messages

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ICalibrationMessage
    Interface that defines the behaviour of a CalibrationMessage.
    IMessage
    Interface that defines a generic Message.
    IOrientationChangedMessage
    Interface that defines the behaviour of a OrientationChangedMessage.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalibrationMessage
    This class models a specific kind of Messages, that are used to supply Finger calibrations.
    Message
    This class models a basic Message of the application protocol for the Bluetooth communication.
    OrientationChangedMessage
    This class models a specific kind of Messages, that are used to supply Finger orientation updates.
